name: 5Postgame
_source: # Claude and Claudia move off-screen. Scroll up
speak;Morrissey;I'm not even going to bother to ask why you ran away.{w}{clear}Making irrational decisions is,{w} for you,{w} par for the course.
speak;Morrissey;Hello to you too,{w} Marcel, Anthony.{w}{clear}If you're going to kill me,{w} I'd prefer being beheaded.{w}{clear}Would give me, I think,{w} a unique perspective on life.
speak;Marcel;You're my brother-in-law.{w}{clear}I wouldn't do something so heinous to a member of my family.
speak;Anthony;That being said,{w} this battle of yours has taken a lot out of us.
speak;Anthony;Which is why we're taking some of your possessions to compensate for our losses.
speak;Anthony;Rest assured,{w} we'll only take what we need.
speak;Marcel;But we do need quite a lot.
speak;Marcel;Your entire stock of weapons,{w} for instance.
speak;Anthony;Yes, and a couple of your wagons.
speak;Marcel;Some food as well.{w}{clear}Maybe some of your jewellery.
speak;Marcel;You don't mind if we keep your brother, do you?
speak;Morrissey;Oh, shut up Norris.{w}{clear}From this position,{w} what can I do?
speak;James;He chewed a hole through the knapsack.
speak;Marcel;Add that to the list, Anthony.
